api/Zigurous.Physics.Explosion.html.title: Class Explosion | Physics Utils
api/Zigurous.Physics.Explosion.html.keywords: Class Explosion Adds an explosion force to all rigidbodies within a set radius upon being triggered. Inheritance System.Object Explosion Namespace : Zigurous.Physics Syntax public class Explosion : MonoBehaviour Fields destroyOnExplode Destroys the game object of the script after exploding. Declaration public bool destroyOnExplode forceMode The type of force applied to affected rigidbodies. Declaration public ForceMode forceMode fuseTime The amount of seconds before the explosion takes effect after being triggered. Declaration public float fuseTime layerMask The layers that can be affected by the explosion. Declaration public LayerMask layerMask radius The radius of the sphere within which the explosion has its effect. Declaration public float radius strength The force strength of the explosion. Declaration public float strength trigger The type of trigger that causes the explosion. Declaration public Explosion.Trigger trigger upwardsModifier An adjustment to the apparent position of the explosion to make it seem to lift objects. Declaration public float upwardsModifier Methods Explode() Declaration public virtual void Explode() Explode(Single) Declaration public void Explode(float fuseTime) Parameters Type Name Description System.Single fuseTime OnCollisionEnter(Collision) Declaration protected virtual void OnCollisionEnter(Collision collision) Parameters Type Name Description Collision collision OnCollisionExit(Collision) Declaration protected virtual void OnCollisionExit(Collision collision) Parameters Type Name Description Collision collision OnTriggerEnter(Collider) Declaration protected virtual void OnTriggerEnter(Collider collider) Parameters Type Name Description Collider collider OnTriggerExit(Collider) Declaration protected virtual void OnTriggerExit(Collider collider) Parameters Type Name Description Collider collider Start() Declaration protected virtual void Start()

api/Zigurous.Physics.Explosion.Trigger.h.title: Enum Explosion.Trigger | Physics Utils
api/Zigurous.Physics.Explosion.Trigger.h.keywords: Enum Explosion.Trigger A type of trigger that causes an explosion. Namespace : Zigurous.Physics Syntax public enum Trigger Fields Name Description Manual The explosion is triggered manually. OnCollisionEnter Triggers the explosion when a collision occurs on the object. OnCollisionExit Triggers the explosion after a collision exits on the object. OnStart Triggers the explosion on the start of the script. OnTriggerEnter Triggers the explosion when entering a trigger collider. OnTriggerExit Triggers the explosion after exiting a trigger collider.

api/Zigurous.Physics.Magnet.html.title: Class Magnet | Physics Utils
api/Zigurous.Physics.Magnet.html.keywords: Class Magnet An object that produces a magnetic field that attracts objects. Inheritance System.Object Magnet Namespace : Zigurous.Physics Syntax public sealed class Magnet : MonoBehaviour Fields strength The strength of the magnet. If an object is within multiple magnetic fields, then it will be attracted to the magnet with the higher strength. Declaration public float strength Properties magneticField The sphere collider that represents the magnetic field of the magnet. Declaration public SphereCollider magneticField { get; } radius The radius of the magnetic field produced by the magnet. Magnetic objects within the radius are attracted to the magnet. Declaration public float radius { get; set; }

api/Zigurous.Physics.Magnetic.html.title: Class Magnetic | Physics Utils
api/Zigurous.Physics.Magnetic.html.keywords: Class Magnetic An object with magnetic properties that can be attracted to a magnet. Inheritance System.Object Magnetic Namespace : Zigurous.Physics Syntax public sealed class Magnetic : MonoBehaviour Properties attractedMagnets The magnets the object is currently attracted to. Declaration public List<Magnet> attractedMagnets { get; } rigidbody The rigidbody of the magnetic object that handles moving the object toward attracted magnets. When not present, forces will be added directly to the transform's position instead. Declaration public Rigidbody rigidbody { get; }

changelog/CHANGELOG.html.title: Changelog | Physics Utils
changelog/CHANGELOG.html.keywords: Changelog All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file. The format is based on Keep a Changelog , and this project adheres to Semantic Versioning . [0.3.1] - 2021/06/28 Changed [AddComponentMenu] attribute added to all behaviors [0.3.0] - 2021/06/09 Added Collider event behaviors [0.2.0] - 2021/05/29 Added Explosion script Changed Renamed physics materials [0.1.0] - 2021/05/19 Added Scripts Magnet Magnetic LayerMask Extensions Materials Bouncy Bouncy Box (2D) Ice MaxFriction Metal Rubber Wood ZeroFriction Slippery (2D) Sticky (2D)

manual/index.html.title: Physics Utils | Physics Utils
manual/index.html.keywords: Physics Utils The Physics Utils package contains physics-related scripts and utilities for Unity projects.

manual/installation.html.title: Installation | Physics Utils
manual/installation.html.keywords: Installation Use the Unity Package Manager to install the Physics Utils package. Open the Package Manager in Window > Package Manager Click the add ( + ) button in the status bar Select Add package from git URL from the add menu Enter the following Git URL in the text box and click Add: https://github.com/zigurous/unity-physics-utils.git For more information on the Package Manager and installing packages, see the following pages: Unity's Package Manager Installing from a Git URL Importing Import the package namespace in each script or file you want to use it. Note : You may need to regenerate project files/assemblies first. using Zigurous.Physics; Source Code The source code for the Physics Utils package is in the following repository: https://github.com/zigurous/unity-physics-utils
